Title: Swiftmailer Sendmail transport arbitrary shell execution
Description: Prior to 5.2.1, the sendmail transport (`Swift_Transport_SendmailTransport`) was vulnerable to an arbitrary shell execution if the "From" header came from a non-trusted source and no "Return-Path" is configured. This has been fixed in 5.2.1. If you are using sendmail as a transport, you are encouraged to upgrade as soon as possible.
NotImpacted: All versions before 4.0.0, all versions starting from 5.2.1
